alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 17 at 6:43PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Tehama and southwestern Shasta Counties through 745 PM PDT... At 642 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from near Igo to 9 miles south of Yolla Bolly District Rs. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Outflow winds may extend many miles from the storms. Locations impacted include... Yolla Bolly District Rs, Igo, Ono, Beegum, Rosewood, Platina, French Gulch and Lewiston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Northern Sacramento Valley; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
